name: Zeew LTD
description: Developer of an online business development software designed to help businesses launch their digital platform immediately. The company's software has a variety of features that include category management, customer management, payment integration, instant order notification, and restaurant owner settings, enabling restaurants, pharmaceuticals, and other businesses to get a seamless online ordering and delivery experience.
one_liner: Developer of an online business development software designed to help businesses launch their digital platform immediately. The company's software has a variety of features that include category management, customer management, payment integration, instant order notification, and restaurant owner settings, enabling restaurants, pharmaceuticals, and other businesses to get a seamless online ordering and delivery experience.
